author: Bloomberg
title: New York Construction Freeze Is Adding to Industry’s Debt Risk
description: Before the crisis, lenders originated roughly $8 billion in loans on New York construction projects.
content:
(Bloomberg)New York Citys construction shutdown has derailed a $66 billion industry, increasing the risk on billions in loans issued to fund projects across the city.
Before the virus outbreak, more than 450 construction projects were underway in New York, w… [+4736 chars]
